channel.title: Help with compiling error

item.title: Help with compiling error
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

Oh, I understand now. Ok now I got this error:

anticrash.java:6: illegal start of type if (println_debug(playerName+" is already online.")) ^ anticrash.java:6: invalid method declaration; return type required if (println_debug(playerName+" is already online.")) ^ anticrash.java:6: <identifier> expected if (println_debug(playerName+" is already online.")) ^ 3 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

with this code:

[code]import java.io.*;
public class anticrash{
public void println_debug(String str) {
System.out.println("[client-"+playerId+"-"+playerName+"]: “+str);
}
if (println_debug(playerName+” is already online."))
{
resetserver();
}

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println(“RESETING SERVER!!!”);
misc.println(“Saving all games…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS”);
closeListener();
runserver();
}[/code]

I can’t find the identifier in my client.java so I can add it here for the playername+ do you know what it is? That would fix that one problem

Read full topic

item.title: Help with compiling error
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

I’m making a new anticrash java file but I get errors while compiling it. Does anybody know how to fix this?

Here are the lines of coding that apply to the error:

[code]import java.io.*;
public class anticrash{
public void println_debug(String str) {
System.out.println("[client-"+playerId+"-"+playerName+"]: “+str);
}
if (println_debug(playerName+” is already online."))
{
resetserver();
}

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println(“RESETING SERVER!!!”);
misc.println(“Saving all games…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS”);
closeListener();
runserver();
}[/code]Here’s the error I get when I try to compile it:

anticrash.java:6: illegal start of type if (println_debug(playerName+" is already online.")) ^ anticrash.java:6: invalid method declaration; return type required if (println_debug(playerName+" is already online.")) ^ anticrash.java:6: <identifier> expected if (println_debug(playerName+" is already online.")) ^ 3 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
